entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_SET_HOME_QUATERNION
entry.description: Changes the home location either to a specified location.

enum.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_RESULT
enum.description: Result of inspection tasks operation (in an INSPECTION_TASKS_ACK message).

entry.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_NO_SPACE
entry.description: Inspection tasks items exceed storage space.

entry.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_INVALID
entry.description: One of the parameters has an invalid value.

entry.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_INVALID_SEQUENCE
entry.description: Inspection tasks item received out of sequence.

entry.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_CANCELLED
entry.description: Current inspection tasks operation cancelled (inspection tasks upload or download).

enum.name: CHECK_LIST_RESULT
enum.description: Result of checklist downloading operation (in a CHECK_LIST_ACK message).

entry.name: CHECK_LIST_INVALID_SEQUENCE
entry.description: Checklist item received out of sequence.

enum.name: ALARM_LIST_RESULT
enum.description: Result of alarm list downloading operation (in an ALARM_LIST_ACK message).

entry.name: ALARM_LIST_NO_SPACE
entry.description: Alarm list items exceed storage space.

entry.name: ALARM_LIST_INVALID_SEQUENCE
entry.description: Alarm list item received out of sequence.

entry.name: ALARM_LIST_CANCELLED
entry.description: Current alarm list download operation cancelled.

enum.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_RESULT
enum.description: Result of high-level action list downloading operation (in an HL_ACTION_LIST_ACK message).

entry.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_NO_SPACE
entry.description: High-level action list items exceed storage space.

entry.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_INVALID_SEQUENCE
entry.description: High-level action list item received out of sequence.

entry.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_CANCELLED
entry.description: Current high-level action list download operation cancelled.

enum.name: ALARM_STATUS_FLAGS
enum.description: Alarm status flags used in ALARM_STATUS messages.

enum.name: TEXT_STATUS_FLAGS
enum.description: Indicates the severity level, used for TEXT_STATUS messages to indicate their relative urgency.

entry.name: TEXT_STATUS_WARNING
entry.description: Indicates about a possible future error if this is not resolved within a given timeframe. Example would be a low battery warning.

entry.name: TEXT_STATUS_INFO
entry.description: Normal operational messages. Useful for logging. No action is required for these messages.

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_COUNT
message.description: Send the number of items in the inspection tasks. This is used to initiate inspection tasks upload or as a response to an INSPECTION_TASKS_REQUEST message when downloading the inspection tasks.
message.field: Number of inspection tasks items in the sequence

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_READ
message.description: Request inspection tasks item data for a specific sequence number be sent by the recipient using an INSPECTION_TASKS_ITEM message. Used for inspection tasks upload and download.
message.field: Waypoint ID (sequence number). Starts at zero

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_ITEM
message.description: Message encoding an inspection tasks item. Used for inspection tasks upload and download.
message.field: Waypoint ID (sequence number). Starts at zero. Increases monotonically for each waypoint, no gaps in the sequence (0,1,2,3,4)
The scheduled action for the waypoint (see MAV_CMD enum)

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_ACK
message.description: Acknowledgment message when a system completes an inspection tasks operation (e.g. sent by robotic vehicle after it has uploaded all inspection tasks items). The message includes an INSPECTION_TASKS_RESULT indicating either success or the type of failure.
message.field: Inspection tasks operation result (see INSPECTION_TASKS_RESULT enum)

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_REQUEST
message.description: Initiate the inspection tasks download operation from a system.

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_SET_CURRENT_ITEM
message.description: Set the inspection task item with sequence number seq as current item.
message.field: Waypoint ID (sequence number). Starts at zero

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_CURRENT_ITEM
message.description: Message that announces the sequence number of the current active inspection task item. The robotic vehicle will move towards this item of the inspection tasks.
message.field: Waypoint ID (sequence number). Starts at zero

message.name: INSPECTION_TASKS_ITEM_REACHED
message.description: Message that announces that a certain item of the inspection tasks has been reached.
message.field: Waypoint ID (sequence number). Starts at zero

message.name: CHECK_LIST_REQUEST
message.description: Initiate the checklist download operation from a system.

message.name: CHECK_LIST_COUNT
message.description: Send the number of items in a checklist. This is used as a response to a CHECK_LIST_REQUEST message when downloading the checklist.
message.field: Number of check items in the sequence

message.name: CHECK_LIST_READ
message.description: Request check item value for a specific sequence number be sent by the recipient using a CHECK_LIST_ITEM message. Used for checklist download.

message.name: CHECK_LIST_ITEM
message.description: The value of a check item. This is used as a response to CHECK_LIST_READ when downloading the checklist.

message.name: CHECK_LIST_ACK
message.description: Acknowledgment message when a system completes the checklist download operation. The message includes a CHECK_LIST_RESULT indicating either success or the type of failure.

message.name: ALARM_LIST_REQUEST
message.description: Initiate the alarm list download operation from a system.

message.name: ALARM_LIST_COUNT
message.description: Send the number of items in an alarm list. This is used as a response to an ALARM_LIST_REQUEST message when downloading the alarm list.
message.field: Number of alarm items in the sequence

message.name: ALARM_LIST_READ
message.description: Request alarm item value for a specific sequence number be sent by the recipient using an ALARM_LIST_ITEM message. Used for alarm list download.

message.name: ALARM_LIST_ITEM
message.description: The value of an alarm item. This is used as a response to an ALARM_LIST_READ message when downloading the alarm list.

message.name: ALARM_LIST_ACK
message.description: Acknowledgment message when a system completes the alarm list download operation. The message includes an ALARM_LIST_RESULT indicating either success or the type of failure.
message.field: Alarm list operation result (see ALARM_LIST_RESULT enum)

message.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_REQUEST
message.description: Initiate the high-level action list download operation from a system.

message.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_COUNT
message.description: Send the number of items in a high-level action list. This is used as a response to a HL_ACTION_LIST_REQUEST message when downloading the high-level action list.
message.field: Number of high-level action items in the sequence

message.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_READ
message.description: Request high-level action item value for a specific sequence number be sent by the recipient using an HL_ACTION_LIST_ITEM message. Used for high-level action list download.
message.field: High-level action index. Starts at zero

message.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_ITEM
message.description: The value of a high-level action item. This is used as a response to an HL_ACTION_LIST_READ message when downloading the high-level action list.
message.field: High-level action index. Starts at zero
Command ID of the command associated with the high-level action (see MAV_CMD enum)

message.name: HL_ACTION_LIST_ACK
message.description: Acknowledgment message when a system completes the high-level action list download operation. The message includes a HL_ACTION_LIST_RESULT indicating either success or the type of failure.
message.field: High-level action list operation result (see HL_ACTION_LIST_RESULT enum)

message.name: ALARM_STATUS
message.description: This message is used to inform the gRCS of the robotic vehicle's alarm status (indicated by its index).
message.field: Alarm errors count since system boot
Alarm warnings count since system boot

message.name: TEXT_STATUS
message.description: This message is used to inform to the gRCS of any type of warning or error that occurred in the robotic vehicle. It can even be used to send information messages to the gRCS.
message.field: Status text message, without null termination character
